section.22: The Book on Virtues of Jihad

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Umamah: That the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: "The most virtuous of charitable spending is the shade of a tent in the cause of Allah, or giving a servant in the cause of Allah, or a riding camel in the cause of Allah." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Gharib Sahih, and it is more correct to me than the narration of Mu'awiyah bin Salih
